message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I can meet you halfway at $110, would that work for you?
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $105. I can do $112, which is a bit closer to what I was originally looking for. What do you think?
I'm really close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
